name: MorningInspirations
0:
”Alexa, open morning inspirations”
”Alexa, start morning inspirations”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: morning inspirations
Developer Terms of Use
des: Start your day with an inspirational list of quotes. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill has quotes from famous personalities like Steve Jobs, Warren Buffett, Bill Gates, MK Gandhi, etc. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer. Listening to the quote would help you set your mood for the day. So what are you waiting for? Please go ahead and use the morning inspirations Alexa skill to improve your life.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
